data.eml:eml: A new species of death adder (Acanthophis: Serpentes: Elapidae) from north-western Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddock, Simon T., Ellis, Ryan J., Doughty, Paul, Smith, Lawrence A., Wüster, Wolfgang (2015): A new species of death adder (Acanthophis: Serpentes: Elapidae) from north-western Australia. Zootaxa 4007 (3): 301-326, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.3.1
